title: Sun Down
summary: Enjoy the illustration of the sunset in funky colors
developerAddress: House # 616, Street # 69, Sector I-8/3, Islamabad, Pakistan.
description: Sometimes all you need is a little splash of colors to relish yourself. Enjoy the illustration of the sunset in funky colors that bring a new life to you smart watch.  Groovy type of text and numbers is used for not being so mainstream. The dim light colors themes signifying the time of the sunset. This watch face shows the digital time with day and numeric date. The theme of the app can be changed into three different color variants. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which saves the battery just by showing the time
